metadata.name: Dinner #1
metadata.description:
It started from a quote in a book I read one day and it says “Happiness is that you eat delicious food with someone you love every day”.
The more I think of a good dinner, the more I’m reminded of some good conversation, warm mood, love, friendship and laughter I had with the people I care about.
Turned those into abstract shapes and playful compositions with colors.
